parameter.label: ${lbl:b_personal}
${lbl:b_number_of_control}

${lbl:b_rotation_scheme}@{select smn_gip.smn_esquema_rotacion.smn_esquema_rotacion_id as id, smn_control_acceso.smn_turnos.tur_codigo || " - " || smn_control_acceso.smn_turnos.tur_nombre as item from smn_control_acceso.smn_turnos, smn_gip.smn_esquema_rotacion where smn_gip.smn_esquema_rotacion.ero_turno = smn_control_acceso.smn_turnos.smn_turnos_id order by smn_control_acceso.smn_turnos.tur_nombre}
${fld:b_start_date_calculus}

${lbl:b_personal_category}@{select smn_gip.smn_categoria_personal.smn_categoria_personal_id as id, smn_gip.smn_categoria_personal.cap_codigo || " - " || smn_gip.smn_categoria_personal.cap_nombre as item from smn_gip.smn_categoria_personal order by smn_gip.smn_categoria_personal.cap_nombre}

${lbl:b_auxiliary_class}@{select smn_base.smn_clase_auxiliar.smn_clase_auxiliar_id as id, smn_base.smn_clase_auxiliar.cla_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_clase_auxiliar.cla_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_clase_auxiliar order by smn_base.smn_clase_auxiliar.cla_nombre}

${lbl:b_auxiliary}@{select smn_base.smn_v_auxiliar.smn_v_auxiliar_id as id, smn_base.smn_v_auxiliar.smn_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_v_auxiliar.smn_item as item from smn_base.smn_v_auxiliar order by smn_base.smn_v_auxiliar.smn_item}

${lbl:b_entity}@{select smn_base.smn_entidades.smn_entidades_id as id, smn_base.smn_entidades.ent_codigo|| " - " || smn_base.smn_entidades.ent_descripcion_corta as item from smn_base.smn_entidades order by smn_base.smn_entidades.ent_descripcion_corta}

${lbl:b_subsidiary}@{select smn_base.smn_sucursales.smn_sucursales_id as id, smn_base.smn_sucursales.suc_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_sucursales.suc_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_sucursales order by smn_base.smn_sucursales.suc_nombre}

${lbl:b_service_area}@{select smn_base.smn_areas_servicios.smn_areas_servicios_id as id, smn_base.smn_areas_servicios.ase_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_areas_servicios.ase_descripcion as item from smn_base.smn_areas_servicios order by smn_base.smn_areas_servicios.ase_descripcion}

${lbl:b_service_unit}@{select smn_base.smn_unidades_servicios.smn_unidades_servicios_id as id, smn_base.smn_unidades_servicios.uns_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_unidades_servicios.uns_descripcion as item from smn_base.smn_unidades_servicios order by smn_base.smn_unidades_servicios.uns_descripcion}

${lbl:b_cost_centers}@{select smn_base.smn_centro_costo.smn_centro_costo_id as id, smn_base.smn_centro_costo.cco_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_centro_costo.cco_descripcion_corta as item from smn_base.smn_centro_costo order by smn_base.smn_centro_costo.cco_descripcion_corta}

${lbl:b_organizational_structure}@{select smn_base.smn_estructura_organizacional.smn_estructura_organizacional_id as id, smn_base.smn_estructura_organizacional.eor_codigo || " - " || smn_base.smn_estructura_organizacional.eor_nombre as item from smn_base.smn_estructura_organizacional order by smn_base.smn_estructura_organizacional.eor_nombre}

${lbl:b_positions}@{select smn_gip.smn_cargos.smn_cargos_id as id, smn_gip.smn_cargos.job_codigo|| " - " || smn_gip.smn_cargos.job_nombre as item from smn_gip.smn_cargos order by smn_gip.smn_cargos.job_nombre}

${lbl:b_position_category}@{select smn_gip.smn_categoria_cargos.smn_categoria_cargos_id as id, smn_gip.smn_categoria_cargos.cat_codigo || " - " || smn_gip.smn_categoria_cargos.cat_nombre as item from smn_gip.smn_categoria_cargos order by smn_gip.smn_categoria_cargos.cat_nombre}
${lbl:b_enables_access_control}@{S=${lbl:b_yes}|N=${lbl:b_not}}
${lbl:b_id_access_control}
${lbl:s_profile_lang}@{${def:locale}}
${lbl:b_users}@{${def:user}}
${lbl:b_store_date}@{${def:date}}
${lbl:s_loginhist_col2}@{${def:time}}
